title: Announcing Aakash's Bundle üéÅüéä
subtitle: Annual subscribers now get access to 9 premium AI and product tools worth $28,336 for as little as $150
author: Aakash Gupta
content_html:
I’m excited to announce that paid annual subscribers to this newsletter now get a full product team stack with their subscription:

That’s a free year of:

  1. Arize

  2. Linear

  3. Mobbin

  4. Dovetail

  5. Descript

  6. DeepSky

  7. Relay.app

  8. Reforge Build

  9. Magic Patterns

This curated collection includes the most cutting-edge AI and product tools that I personally use and recommend.

These are tools that will make you a more effective AI PM, help you ship faster, and keep you ahead in the rapidly evolving AI landscape.

The collection provides over $28,8336 in value for just $150/year.

Here’s the math:

Yes, this is for real.

Most of these companies have never offered deals like this before: including Relay, Arize, Dovetail, Deepsky and Reforge Build.

And I’m giving you access to all of them:

Subscribe now

I’ll be adding new tools monthly as the AI and product landscape evolve. I’m already in contact with 10+ more products for you.

So this subscription is just designed to get better and better.

How these tools come together

In my opinion, this is the most ambitious tool bundle specifically designed for product managers navigating the AI era.

That’s because it covers every important part of AI PM.

To be specific, here’s how all of these tools come together:

  1. Relay.app: AI agents

  2. Arize: AI Evals and observability

  3. Reforge Build: AI prototyping

  4. DeepSky: AI Superagent

  5. Dovetail: AI customer intelligence

  6. Descript: AI video editing

  7. Magic Patterns: AI prototyping

  8. Linear: Task management and AI agent calling

  9. Mobbin: Design inspiration

I’ll actually be sharing deep dives on all these tools in the coming year.

Subscribe now

Founding Members Get Priority

Since our offer codes are limited, we expect high-demand products to run out quickly. To ensure you get access to what you want most, we’re offering the Founding Member tier for $250/year, which includes:

  1. Priority access: While Annual subscribers get access first-come, first-served, Founding Members get reserved priority access to the most popular tools in the collection.

  2. Premium benefits: Founding Members get regular paid products, the first being my prompt library and the next being an AI PM certificate, a 5-hour video course releasing in 1.5 weeks.

I’ll be adding new products to the bundle every month. A few upcoming partners are only offering only to founding members.

Subscribe now

Important offer details (read before subscribing)

  1. You must be a new customer of these products to get the free year. If you’ve already paid for a product before, you won’t be able to get an additional free year of that specific product.

  2. You must get an Annual or Founding Member subscription to Product Growth to be eligible. Monthly subscribers aren’t eligible. Free trial users aren’t eligible.

  3. Both existing and new subscribers are eligible for this deal. Existing subscribers can redeem the offer here.

  4. We may run out of codes at any time. Your code is only secured once you claim it. Claim the products you’re most excited about first.

  5. Your free year begins when you redeem the code on the partner’s website, not when you purchase your newsletter subscription or claim your code.

  6. Free trials do not count. Your card must have been charged in order to get access to the codes. You will have to wait for your 7 day trial period to end to get access to the codes.

  7. All sales are final. We won’t issue refunds if some products run out by the time you claim them. The deal is already incredibly valuable, even if a few products are unavailable.

Why am I doing this?

The PM world is transforming faster than ever. AI is reshaping how we build products, what skills matter, and how we create value. Every week brings new tools we need to master to stay relevant and competitive.

What product managers need most right now is:

  1. Practical, actionable advice from people building in the trenches (newsletter)

  2. Access to the latest AI and product tools to understand where the industry is headed (this bundle)

  3. Clear guidance on how to leverage these tools to advance your career (podcast)

That’s exactly what Product Growth delivers.

I’ve already built the #1 AI PM newsletter with 204,000+ subscribers, a top-ranked podcast featuring the world’s best product leaders, and in-depth guides that have helped thousands of PMs land jobs and level up. Now, I want to give you even more value.

When I saw that this was a possibility with other newsletters doing it, I knew I had to use my connections to get you all something similar.

It’s been over 6 months in the works, and now it’s finally here.

Think of your Product Growth subscription as your AI PM career accelerator: all the insights, resources, and tools you need to build world-class AI products and advance your PM career. For just $150-250/year.

Subscribe now

In the coming weeks, I’ll share detailed guides on how to leverage these tools to work smarter, ship faster, and become an indispensable AI-savvy PM.

How to redeem the offer

Step 1: Get an Annual or Founding Member subscription to Product Growth.
Step 2: Redeem your codes here.
Step 3: Build better products, ship faster, and level up your PM career.

A summary of what a paid subscription includes

To summarize, your paid subscription now includes:

  1. The #1 AI PM newsletter with 4+ years of deeply researched guides on product management, AI, growth, and career advancement

  2. Weekly podcast episodes featuring conversations with the world’s best product leaders and AI builders

  3. Premium books and guides including “The Ultimate Guide to Getting a PM Job” and more

  4. This growing collection of world-class AI and product tools

It’s everything you need to build world-class AI products and advance your PM career.

If you’ve already got a subscription, consider gifting a subscription to a colleague or purchasing a group subscription for your team.

Give a gift subscription

Get 20% off a group subscription

Let’s build the future,

Aakash
